casebody.data:
Richmond et al., Respondents, v. Darien Short Line R. Co., Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. November, 1889.) Appeal from city court, general term.

Argued before Larremore, C. J., and Van Hoesen, J.

Marsten Niles, for appellant. A. P. W. Seaman, for respondents.

No opinion. Order affirmed, with costs.
